contactsmanager

Class XmlDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • contactsmanager.XmlDataStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStore

    public class XmlDataStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataStore
    An implementation of DataStore that loads and saves data in xml files.
